headline.main: The Evidence Mounts On Passive Smoking

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: AFTER years of questioning the potential health hazards of secondhand cigarette smoke, a growing number of scientists and health officials are becoming persuaded that the dangers are real, broader than once believed and parallel those of direct smoke.
